hackathon-eligibility:
Anyone can enter who is a delegate at
Individuals or teams of up to 5.
hackathon-requirements: Development language is open, so whatever you are comfortable with - NET, C/C++, Java or Web based
hackathon-rules: Your app needs to be developed to run on any Motorola Solutions device...we’ll ensure that we have a selection of our devices available for the Hackathon for you to test. We have many devies running both Android and WinEmbedded HH6.5. See the full range of mobile computers here:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The overall winner, or each member of the winning team of up to 5, will each receive a Parrot AR Drone.
The runner up, or each member of the runner-up team of up to 5, will each win a Raspberry Pi Model B+ (B Plus) Complete Starter Kit
The Third-place individual, or each team-member of up to 5, will each receive a copy of ALK CoPilot Premium, US or Europe, GPS navigation app.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: ALK CoPilot Premium, US or Europe Sat-Nav

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Ease of use and great interface design
Use of Printers, barcode scanning, NFC, etc
Most innovative ideas and features incorporated
Effectiveness and delivery of presentation to the judges

hackathon-description-header: Enterprise AppForum is all about developing apps for enterprise. Our Hackathon will run in parallel and be a fun opportunity for you to show off your creative skills. First prize is a Parrot AR Drone!
